name: Slime Force!
description:
Ready for a new adventure? Jump now with your favorite Slimes trough the parkour in different game modes!

'Slime Force!' is a spin-off of our first ever game: 'Slime!' with a lot of new things!

  • 2 player gamemode! In this gamemode you can co up with your freind!
  • SPEED gamemode! Every coin you collect makes you faster in this mode!
  • CLASSIC gamemode! You like the classic? No problem! We got you!
  • New character designs! Blue Slime, Green Slime and the others are upgraded!
  • New character! Purple Slime is added! No worries Red Slime is coming back.
  • New instruction scenes! You don't know what to do? Instruction scenes will help you!
  • New credits scene! Wanna see who made this game? Just look in the settings!
